_config:table.definition:
CREATE VIEW VI_CE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# AS ( SELECT CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID,CATENTRY.MEMBER_ID,CATENTRY.CATENTTYPE_ID,CATENTRY.PARTNUMBER,CATENTRY.MFPARTNUMBER,CATENTRY.MFNAME, CATENTRY.BUYABLE, CATENTRY.STARTDATE, CATENTRY.ENDDATE, STORECENT.STOREENT_ID, CATENTSUBS.SUBSCPTYPE_ID,CATENTSUBS.DISALLOW_REC_ORDER, TI_CEPUB.PUBLISHED DEEPPUBLISHED,
COALESCE(TI_DPGROUP.CATGROUP,TI_DPGROUPI.CATGROUP) AS DPCATGROUP, COALESCE(TI_APGROUPI.CATGROUPS,TI_APGROUP.CATGROUPS) AS APCATGROUP, COALESCE(TI_APGROUP.CATPATHS,TI_APGROUPI.CATPATHS) AS APCATPATH,
TI_PRODUCTSET.PRODUCTSET, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_USD,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_USD,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_USD) PRICE_USD, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_EUR,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_EUR,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_EUR) PRICE_EUR, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_CAD,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_CAD,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_CAD) PRICE_CAD, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_CNY,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_CNY,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_CNY) PRICE_CNY, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_JPY,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_JPY,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_JPY) PRICE_JPY, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_KRW,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_KRW,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_KRW) PRICE_KRW, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_BRL,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_BRL,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_BRL) PRICE_BRL, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_TWD,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_TWD,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_TWD) PRICE_TWD, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_PLN,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_PLN,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_PLN) PRICE_PLN, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_RUB,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_RUB,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_RUB) PRICE_RUB, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_RON,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_RON,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_RON) PRICE_RON, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_EGP,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_EGP,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_EGP) PRICE_EGP, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_GBP,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_GBP,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_GBP) PRICE_GBP, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_TRY,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_TRY,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_TRY) PRICE_TRY, COALESCE(TI_OFFERPRICE.PRICE_ILS,TI_BUNDLEPRICE.PRICE_ILS,TI_DKITPRICE.PRICE_ILS) PRICE_ILS, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_USD,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_USD,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_USD) LISTPRICE_USD, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_EUR,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_EUR,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_EUR) LISTPRICE_EUR, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_CAD,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_CAD,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_CAD) LISTPRICE_CAD, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_CNY,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_CNY,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_CNY) LISTPRICE_CNY, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_JPY,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_JPY,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_JPY) LISTPRICE_JPY, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_KRW,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_KRW,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_KRW) LISTPRICE_KRW, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_BRL,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_BRL,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_BRL) LISTPRICE_BRL, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_TWD,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_TWD,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_TWD) LISTPRICE_TWD, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_PLN,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_PLN,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_PLN) LISTPRICE_PLN, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_RUB,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_RUB,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_RUB) LISTPRICE_RUB, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_RON,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_RON,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_RON) LISTPRICE_RON, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_EGP,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_EGP,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_EGP) LISTPRICE_EGP, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_GBP,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_GBP,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_GBP) LISTPRICE_GBP, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_TRY,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_TRY,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_TRY) LISTPRICE_TRY, COALESCE(TI_LISTPRICE.LISTPRICE_ILS,TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.LISTPRICE_ILS,TI_LDKITPRICE.LISTPRICE_ILS) LISTPRICE_ILS, TI_CNTRPRICE.PRICE CNTRPRICE, TI_DPCATENTRY.CATENTRY_PARENT, TI_DPCATENTRY.ITEM_SEQUENCE, TI_GROUPING.GROUPING, TI_COMPONENTS.COMPONENTS CATENTRY_COMPONENTS, TI_DCCATENTRY.CATENTRY_CHILD, COALESCE(TI_CATALOG.CATALOG,TI_CATALOGI.CATALOG) AS PARENT_CATALOG_ID, TI_CATGPENREL.SEQUENCE CATENTRY_SEQUENCE, TI_ENTGRPPATH.ENTGRPPATH,
CATENTDESC.NAME,CATENTDESC.SHORTDESCRIPTION,CATENTDESC.LONGDESCRIPTION,CATENTDESC.KEYWORD, COALESCE(TE.PATH,CATENTDESC.THUMBNAIL) AS THUMBNAIL, COALESCE(FE.PATH, CATENTDESC.FULLIMAGE) AS FULLIMAGE, COALESCE(TI_CATENTDESC.PUBLISHED,CATENTDESC.PUBLISHED) AS PUBLISHED, TI_CATENTDESCOVR.NAME_OVR, TI_CATENTDESCOVR.SHORTDESC_OVR, TI_CATENTDESCOVR.KEYWORD_OVR, TI_CATENTDESCOVR.PUBLISHED_OVR, TI_DPGRPNAME.CATGRPNAME CATGRPNAME, TI_SEOURL.SEO_TOKEN, TI_ATTR.ATTRS ATTRS, TI_ATTR.ATTRI ATTRI, TI_ATTR.ATTRF ATTRF, TI_ATTR.SRCHS SRCHS, TI_ATTR.SRCHI SRCHI, TI_ATTR.SRCHF SRCHF, TI_ADATTR.ATTRIBUTES CATENTRY_ATTRIBUTES,
DKPREDEFCONF.COMPLETE COMPLETE, CATCONFINF.REFERENCE DKMODELREFERENCE, CATCONFINF.URL DKURL, CATCONFINF.CONFIGURATION DKDEFAULTCONFIG, CATCONFINF.CONFIGURABLE DKCONFIGURABLE, CATCONFINF_PARENT.REFERENCE DKMODELREFERENCE_PARENT, CATCONFINF_PARENT.CONFIGURABLE DKCONFIGURABLE_PARENT, TI_PDK_DK.CATENTRY_ID_DK CATENTRY_ID_DK FROM CATENTRY INNER JOIN TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=CE.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN STORECENT ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=STORECENT.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CATENTSUBS ON (CATENTSUBS.CATENTRY_ID=CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_CEPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_CEPUB ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_CEPUB.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_DPGROUP_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_DPGROUP ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_DPGROUP.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_DPGROUPI_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_DPGROUPI ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_DPGROUPI.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_APGROUP_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_APGROUP ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_APGROUP.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_APGROUPI_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_APGROUPI ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_APGROUPI.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_PRODUCTSET_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_PRODUCTSET ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_PRODUCTSET.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_OFFERPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_OFFERPRICE ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_OFFERPRICE.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_BUNDLEPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_BUNDLEPRICE ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_BUNDLEPRICE.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_DKITPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_DKITPRICE ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_DKITPRICE.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_LISTPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_LISTPRICE ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_LISTPRICE.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_LBUNDLEPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_LBUNDLEPRICE ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_LBUNDLEPRICE.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_LDKITPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_LDKITPRICE ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_LDKITPRICE.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_CNTRPRICE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_CNTRPRICE ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_CNTRPRICE.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_DPCATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_DPCATENTRY ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_DPCATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_GROUPING_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_GROUPING ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_GROUPING.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_COMPONENTS_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_COMPONENTS ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_COMPONENTS.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_DCCATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_DCCATENTRY ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_DCCATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_CATALOG_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_CATALOG ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_CATALOG.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_CATALOGI_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_CATALOGI ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_CATALOGI.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_CATGPENREL_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_CATGPENREL ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_ENTGRPPATH_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_ENTGRPPATH ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_ENTGRPPATH.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CATENTDESC ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=CATENTDESC.CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTDESC.LANGUAGE_ID=-#lang_tag#) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_CATENTDESC_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# TI_CATENTDESC ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_CATENTDESC.CATENTRY_ID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CATENTRY_ID, LANGUAGE_ID, PATH FROM CATENTRY_EXTERNAL_CONTENT_REL TR, EXTERNAL_CONTENT_ASSET TA, EXTERNAL_CONTENT_TYPE TT WHERE TR.CONTENT_ID = TA.CONTENT_ID AND TR.TYPE = TT.IDENTIFIER AND TT.USAGE = 'images' AND TA.ASSETNAME = 'main_thumbnail') TE ON TE.CATENTRY_ID=CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID AND TE.LANGUAGE_ID=-#lang_tag# LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CATENTRY_ID, LANGUAGE_ID, PATH FROM CATENTRY_EXTERNAL_CONTENT_REL FR, EXTERNAL_CONTENT_ASSET FA, EXTERNAL_CONTENT_TYPE FT WHERE FR.CONTENT_ID = FA.CONTENT_ID AND FR.TYPE = FT.IDENTIFIER AND FT.USAGE = 'images' AND FA.ASSETNAME = 'main_fullimage') FE ON FE.CATENTRY_ID=CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID AND FE.LANGUAGE_ID=-#lang_tag#
LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_CEDSOVR_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# TI_CATENTDESCOVR ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_CATENTDESCOVR.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_DPGRPNAME_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# TI_DPGRPNAME ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_DPGRPNAME.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_SEOURL_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# TI_SEOURL ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_SEOURL.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_ATTR_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# TI_ATTR ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_ATTR.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_ADATTR_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# TI_ADATTR ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_ADATTR.CATENTRY_ID)
LEFT OUTER JOIN DKPDCCATENTREL ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN DKPREDEFCONF ON (DKPREDEFCONF.DKPREDEFCONF_ID=DKPDCCATENTREL.DKPREDEFCONF_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CATCONFINF ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=CATCONFINF.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TI_PDK_DK_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# TI_PDK_DK ON (CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=TI_PDK_DK.CATENTRY_ID_PDK) LEFT OUTER JOIN CATCONFINF CATCONFINF_PARENT ON (TI_PDK_DK.CATENTRY_ID_DK=CATCONFINF_PARENT.CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: VI_CE_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag#
